p_01: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use and share personal information from users of our application. By using our application, you accept the practices described in this policy.
p_02: We do not collect personally identifiable information from users of our application.
p_03: We collect information about the device you use to access our application. This may include the device model, operating system version, IP address, and other technical details.
p_04: We use the information collected to improve our application and provide an optimal user experience. We do not share or sell personal information with third parties.
p_05: Our application does not use cookies or similar technologies to track user activity.
p_06: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.
p_07: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us via email.
